verses.verse: נִדְרַ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <S%H1875><s%> nid-Rash-ti I am sought לְל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> le-Lo not שָׁאָ֔לוּ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'A-lu, of [them that] asked נִמְצֵ֖אתִי <S%H4672><s%> nim-Tze-ti [for me] I am found לְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> le-Lo me not בִקְשֻׁ֑נִי <S%H1245><s%> vik-Shu-ni; of [them that] sought אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said הִנֵּ֣נִי <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ne-ni behold הִנֵּ֔נִי <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ne-ni, behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy Behold me behold me unto a nation לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not קֹרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> ko-Ra [that] was not called בִשְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> vish-Mi. by my name

פֵּרַ֧שְׂתִּי <S%H6566><s%> pe-Ras-ti I have spread out יָדַ֛י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai my hands כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom all the day אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am people סוֹרֵ֑ר <S%H5637><s%> so-Rer; unto a rebellious הַהֹלְכִים֙ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-le-Chim which walketh הַדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech in a way לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, [that was] not good אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char after מַחְשְׁבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4284><s%> mach-she-vo-tei-Hem. their own thoughts

הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, A people הַמַּכְעִיסִ֥ים <S%H3707><s%> ham-mach-'i-Sim that provoketh me to anger אוֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai to my face תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid; continually זֹֽבְחִים֙ <S%H2076><s%> zoe-Chim that sacrificeth בַּגַּנּ֔וֹת <S%H1593><s%> bag-gan-Not, in gardens וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> u-me-kat-te-Rim and burneth incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַלְּבֵנִֽים׃ <S%H3843><s%> hal-le-ve-Nim. upon altars of brick

הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim Which remain בַּקְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H6913><s%> bak-ke-va-Rim, among the graves וּבַנְּצוּרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> u-van-ne-tzu-Rim in the monuments יָלִ֑ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> ya-Li-nu; and lodge הָאֹֽכְלִים֙ <S%H398><s%> ha-'o-che-Lim which eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> be-Sar flesh הַחֲזִ֔יר <S%H2386><s%> ha-cha-Zir, swine's; וּפְרַק u-fe-rak כוּמְרַ֥ק <S%H6564><s%> u-me-Rak broth קפִּגֻּלִ֖ים <S%H6292><s%> pig-gu-Lim of abominable כְּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3627><s%> ke-lei-Hem. [things is in] their vessels

הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> ha-'o-me-Rim Which say קְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> ke-Rav Stand אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּגַּשׁ־ <S%H5066><s%> tig-gash- by thyself come not near בִּ֖י bi כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For קְדַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <S%H6942><s%> ke-dash-Ti-cha; to me for I am holier אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These עָשָׁ֣ן <S%H6227><s%> 'a-Shan than thou These [are] a smoke בְּאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Pi, in my nose אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh a fire יֹקֶ֖דֶת <S%H3344><s%> yo-Ke-det that burneth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. all the day

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold כְתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> che-tu-Vah Behold [it is] written לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai; before לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶחֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H2814><s%> 'e-che-Seh me I will not keep silence כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but שִׁלַּ֔מְתִּי <S%H7999><s%> shil-Lam-ti, but will recompense וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֖י <S%H7999><s%> ve-shil-lam-Ti even recompense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into חֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H2436><s%> chei-Kam. into their bosom

עֲ֠וֹנֹתֵיכֶם <S%H5771><s%> 'A-vo-no-tei-chem Your iniquities וַעֲוֹנֹ֨ת <S%H5771><s%> va-'a-vo-Not and the iniquities אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem of your fathers יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Because קִטְּרוּ֙ <S%H6999><s%> kit-te-Ru which have burned incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim, upon the mountains וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> hag-ge-va-'ot me upon the hills חֵרְפ֑וּנִי <S%H2778><s%> che-re-Fu-ni; and blasphemed וּמַדֹּתִ֧י <S%H4058><s%> u-mad-do-Ti therefore will I measure פְעֻלָּתָ֛ם <S%H6468><s%> fe-'ul-la-Tam work רִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> ri-sho-Nah their former; עַל־ 'al- כאֶל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'el- and חֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> chei-Kam. about קס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze is found הַתִּירוֹשׁ֙ <S%H8492><s%> hat-ti-ro-Vosh As the new wine בָּֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <S%H811><s%> ba-'esh-Kol, in the cluster וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar and [one] saith אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּשְׁחִיתֵ֔הוּ <S%H7843><s%> tash-chi-Te-hu, Destroy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki there בְרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> ve-ra-Chah it not for a blessing בּ֑וֹ bo; כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh [is] in it so will I do לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an behalf עֲבָדַ֔י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai, for my servants' לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not הַֽשְׁחִ֥ית <S%H7843><s%> hash-Chit sakes that I may not destroy הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol. all

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ti And I will bring forth מִֽיַּעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> mi-ya-'a-Ko out of Jacob זֶ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra', a seed וּמִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> u-mi-hu-Dah and out of Judah יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> yo-Resh an inheritor הָרָ֑י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rai; of my mountains וִירֵשׁ֣וּהָ <S%H3423><s%> vi-re-Shu-ha shall inherit בְחִירַ֔י <S%H972><s%> ve-chi-Rai, and mine elect וַעֲבָדַ֖י <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dai it and my servants יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> yish-ke-nu- shall dwell שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. there

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <S%H8289><s%> hash-sha-rOn And Sharon לִנְוֵה־ <S%H5116><s%> lin-veh- shall be a fold צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> Tzon, of flocks וְעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> ve-'E-mek and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <S%H5911><s%> a-Chor of Achor לְרֵ֣בֶץ <S%H7258><s%> le-Re-vetz to lie down in בָּקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar; a place for the herds לְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mi for my people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who דְּרָשֽׁוּנִי׃ <S%H1875><s%> de-ra-Shu-ni. that have sought

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem who עֹזְבֵ֣י <S%H5800><s%> 'o-ze-Vei But ye [are] they that forsake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הַשְּׁכֵחִ֖ים <S%H7911><s%> hash-she-che-Chim cause to forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> har mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> kod-shi my holy הַֽעֹרְכִ֤ים <S%H6186><s%> ha-'o-re-Chim that prepare לַגַּד֙ <S%H1409><s%> lag-Gad Fortune שֻׁלְחָ֔ן <S%H7979><s%> shul-Chan, a table וְהַֽמְמַלְאִ֖ים <S%H4390><s%> ve-ham-mal-'Im and that furnish לַמְנִ֥י <S%H4507><s%> lam-Ni unto that number מִמְסָֽךְ׃ <S%H4469><s%> mi-Sach. the drink offering

וּמָנִ֨יתִי <S%H4487><s%> u-ma-Ni-ti Therefore will I number אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem לַחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> la-Che-rev, you to the sword וְכֻלְּכֶם֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chul-le-Chem and all לַטֶּ֣בַח <S%H2874><s%> lat-Te-vach to the slaughter תִּכְרָ֔עוּ <S%H3766><s%> tich-Ra-'u, and ye shall all bow down יַ֤עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because קָרָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti because when I called וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not עֲנִיתֶ֔ם <S%H6030><s%> 'a-ni-Tem, ye did not answer דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti when I spake וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem; ye did not hear וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> vat-ta-'a-Su but did הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nai, before mine eyes וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> u-va-'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fatz-ti [that] wherein I delighted בְּחַרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H977><s%> be-char-Tem. and did choose פ Peh

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֤י׀ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai Behold my servants יֹאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> yo-Che-lu shall eat וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תִּרְעָ֔בוּ <S%H7456><s%> tir-'A-vu, but ye shall be hungry הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai behold my servants יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> yish-Tu shall drink וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תִּצְמָ֑אוּ <S%H6770><s%> titz-Ma-'u; but ye shall be thirsty הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai behold my servants יִשְׂמָ֖חוּ <S%H8055><s%> yis-Ma-chu shall rejoice וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תֵּבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> te-Vo-shu. but ye shall be ashamed

הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai Behold my servants יָרֹ֖נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> ya-Ron-nu shall sing מִטּ֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> mit-Tuv for joy לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev; of heart וְאַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תִּצְעֲקוּ֙ <S%H6817><s%> titz-'a-Ku but ye shall cry מִכְּאֵ֣ב <S%H3511><s%> mik-ke-'Ev for sorrow לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, of heart וּמִשֵּׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> u-mish-She-ver for vexation ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach of spirit תְּיֵלִֽילוּ׃ <S%H3213><s%> te-ye-Li-lu. and shall howl

וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֨ם <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-nach-Tem And ye shall leave שִׁמְכֶ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> shim-Chem your name לִשְׁבוּעָה֙ <S%H7621><s%> lish-vu-'Ah for a curse לִבְחִירַ֔י <S%H972><s%> liv-chi-Rai, unto my chosen וֶהֱמִיתְךָ֖ <S%H4191><s%> ve-he-mi-te-Cha shall slay אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai for the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD וְלַעֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> ve-la-'a-va-Dav his servants יִקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ra thee and call שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher. by another
